name: Resume Shortlisting Feature
description: A public-facing resume shortlisting feature on the website homepage that gives job seekers instant feedback on their applications using AI-powered evaluation, with self-scheduling for shortlisted candidates.
goals: Provide instant feedback to job seekers upon resume submission
Automate initial screening using AI-powered evaluation
Enable shortlisted candidates to self-schedule interviews
audience: Job seekers applying on the website
constraints: No complex integrations for initial release
success_criteria: Shortlist decision within seconds of upload
